Container.changes: [center][img width='460px' src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ninthwalker/docker-templates/master/brentsflix/images/plexreportlogo.png'][/center] [center][font size=4]plexReport Changelog[/font][/center] [b]20APR2016:[/b] Re-release of bstascavage's plexReport in docker form.[br] [b]09JUN2016:[/b] Fixed bundler error, updated email template to fix pictures, added backup config during initial script run[br] [b]13JUN2016:[/b] Changed the way cron is handled. Using new .cron system from unRAID 6.[br] [b]04NOV2016:[/b] initial_setup.sh changes: no longer need to rerun this after a docker reinstall,[br] removed config backup: instead check on existing config, code refinement changes to streamline installation.[br]
Container.Name: plexReport
Container.Overview: plexReport generates an email to send to your users with all the latest Plex content
Container.Description: plexReport generates an email to send to your users with all the latest Plex content
